locationQuery.description: Location name as you would search it on Airbnb.

maxListings.description: Limit the number of results. Higher limits will take longer to scrape.

simple.description: If true, only core listing data will be scraped.

startUrls.description: Array of URLs to specific Airbnb listings. Overrides 'locationQuery'.

includeReviews.description: If true, reviews will be included in the scraping.

maxReviews.description: Limit the number of reviews per listing. Use -1 for all reviews.

calendarMonths.description: Number of months to scrape from the host's calendar.

addMoreHostInfo.description: If true, additional host information will be included.

locale.description: Locale for listing details and reviews.

minPrice.description: Minimum price per night for filtering listings.

maxPrice.description: Maximum price per night for filtering listings.

useApifyProxy.description: Use Apify Proxy or your custom proxy.

maxConcurrency.description: Max number of pages to be processed in parallel.

limitPoints.description: Limits the number of geo points returned by the reverse API.

timeoutMs.description: Override the default 60s timeout in milliseconds.

debugLog.description: If true, additional debugging information will be shown.
